result: Answer 155) The human resources sector of a company aims to hire to adapt to article 93 of Law No. 8.213/91, which provides: art. 93. The company with 100 (one hundred) or more employees is required to fill from 2% (two percent) to 5% (five percent) of its positions with rehabilitated beneficiaries or persons with disabilities, qualified, in the following proportion: I . Up to 200 employees .............................. 2%; II. From 201 to 500 employees ...................... 3%; III. from 501 to 1,000 employees ................... 4%; IV. From 1 001 onwards ..................................... 5%.
